epic_fantasy.suffix: Majestic castles, floating islands, dragon riders, magical auras, crystalline structures, ethereal lighting, fantasy masterpiece

dark_fantasy.suffix: Gothic architecture, ominous skies, shadowy creatures, blood moon, haunted forests, dark magic, Tim Burton aesthetic

celestial_fantasy.suffix: Angelic beings, heavenly realms, golden light rays, cosmic temples, star portals, divine architecture, celestial magic

elemental_fantasy.suffix: Fire spirits, water elementals, earth golems, air sylphs, elemental powers, magical energy, Avatar the Last Airbender style

dragon_realm.suffix: Ancient dragons, treasure hoards, volcanic lairs, dragon riders, scales and wings, medieval fantasy, Game of Thrones aesthetic

unicorn_dreams.suffix: Mystical unicorns, rainbow manes, enchanted forests, sparkling magic, prismatic light, fairy tale beauty, Lisa Frank aesthetic

phoenix_rebirth.suffix: Rising phoenix, flames of rebirth, golden feathers, ash and fire, resurrection magic, mythical bird, Harry Potter aesthetic
